ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Has this ever happened to you?? and what can you do when it does
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve actually left camps where I was farming when lower lvl people came around and wanted to hunt there. I don t like to fight over spawns with people. I will
ygData.messageBody:
I've actually left camps where I was farming when lower lvl people came
around and wanted to hunt there. I don't like to fight over spawns with
people. I will buff them up and tell them to holler for me if they need help
if I'm still in zone. I would do horribly on PVP bc I would rather make
people happy and help out than compete.
luv,
-Su

It's true, some people are real jerks. If I need to farm silks with my
58 druid and I see a bunch of low-levels fighting spiders for exp,
I try to buy the silks. I will do something else before I KS,
especially a Baron to a level 10, that is extremely asinine.
